## About this package

**positron.tutorials** is a collection of tutorials for working with Positron. Covers scripts, Quarto documents, git, Github, and Quarto websites. Makes extensive use of the tools in the **[tutorial.helpers](https://ppbds.github.io/tutorial.helpers/)** package. 

## Installation

To install the package from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("positron.tutorials")
```

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("PPBDS/positron.tutorials")
```

**positron.tutorials** is currently not avaible on CRAN.
